title.rendered: SPRING VIBES FEATURING BY FAR BAGS

content.rendered:
SPRING VIBES FEATURING BY FAR BAGS

Spring and Summer 2021 is here and it’s time to have some fun with fashion and accessories again! Give life to a casual weekend look with a beautiful fun pastel bag like the crazy popular BY FAR bag. BY FAR shoulder bags have a very cool ‘90s vibes with a silver chain that gives these bags a distinct look. 

Every fashion influencer can’t stop collecting BY FAR bags in every different color and with a reasonable price it’s a good idea to pick your favorite pastel color and make the purchase. The bag is sure to outline fast trends since it has a very clean look but with a unique chain that will go with pretty much any outfit.

The other bags that are featured are a little more on the pricy side like the Bottega Veneta, Cult Gaia, and The Row minimalistic moon bag.

Which color were you thinking to get? I personally love the BY FAR bag in baby blue to go with my D’Lashes brand color.

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love!
